items.sentence: Tom had only himself to blame for the failure.
Tom has a friend whose father is an astronaut.
Do you think you can do that without any help?
Do you think you could give Tom a little help?
Do you think you could talk to Tom about that?
Do you think you speak French better than Tom?
It\'s really dark here. I can\'t see anything.
Is it possible to forget your native language?
Is it possible to land a plane on this island?
Is it true Tom will go to Australia next year?
